title: Infor WMS Questionnaire
description: Comprehensive WMS discovery and requirements assessment

sections.title: Executive Summary & Value Discovery
sections.description: Understanding pain points and value drivers

questions.text: What are your top 3 business challenges related to warehouse operations?
What are your current annual warehouse operational costs?
What is your inventory carrying cost as % of inventory value?
What is your current cost per order?
What is your current OTIF (On Time In Full) score %?
What is your current order fulfillment accuracy rate?
What is your current inventory accuracy level (%)?
What is your current returns rate (%)?
How many channels do you operate? (B2B, B2C, B2B2C)
What is your annual IT spend on warehouse/logistics systems?
What is the estimated value of write-off/scrap/damage annually?
What is your warehouse capacity utilization %?
